columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether this activity log alert is enabled.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of this activity log alert.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the resource. Since Azure Activity Log Alerts is a global service, the location of the rules should always be 'global'.

columns.name: scopes
columns.description: A list of resourceIds that will be used as prefixes.

columns.name: condition
columns.description: The condition that will cause this alert to activate.

columns.name: actions
columns.description: The actions that will activate when the condition is met.
